title: Driver who inhaled laughing gas before killing 81-year-old cyclist in hit-and-run detained
description: Cain Byrne, 20, who has never held a driving licence, made no attempt to stop at the crossing where 81-year-old Graham Slinn was struck, witnesses said.
content:
A driver who was inhaling nitrous oxide before and after he hit and killed an 81-year-old cyclist has been detained for more than 11 years.
Graham Slinn had dismounted and was walking across the A57 near Todwick, South Yorkshire, when he was hit by a... [2894 chars]

title: Mother, 28, jailed for violently shaking baby daughter to death
description: Melissa Wilband is jailed for 15 years for the manslaughter of her four-month-old daughter.
content:
A mother has been jailed for 15 years after causing the death of her baby daughter by violently shaking her.
Melissa Wilband, from Gloucestershire, was found guilty of the manslaughter of Lexi Wilband, who was four months old when she died in April 2... [323 chars]

title: Bangladesh crash: At least 19 dead after air force jet crashes into school
description: The air force training aircraft crashed into a school campus in the capital Dhaka.
content:
The age range for students attending the school is between four and 18 years old.
A teacher at the college, Rezaul Islam, told BBC Bangla that he saw the plane "directly" hit the building.
Another teacher, Masud Tarik, told Reuters that he heard an e... [1108 chars]

title: Somerset coach crash: Locals praised for 'amazing' response
description: Fundraising for victims of a crash that killed a 10-year-old boy has now passed £50,000.
content:
A man who has raised £30,000 so far for victims of a fatal coach crash has said he has been "overwhelmed" by the response of the local community.
Bobbie Rammond said residents had been "amazing" after a coach carrying pupils from Minehead Middle Scho... [394 chars]
